short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that adds the "Word of the Day" pages' links to the dictionary page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Word of the Day Enhancer: A Comprehensive Extension

Elevate your vocabulary journey with our browser extension. This tool seamlessly integrates Merriam-Webster's "Word of the Day" pages' links into your dictionary experience.

Key Features:

Instant Access: Quickly find the "Word of the Day" pages directly on the dictionary page.
Consistent Updates: Ensure you always have access to the most recent "Word of the Day" by resolving potential synchronization issues.

Expand your knowledge and enhance your learning with our "Merriam-Webster's Word of the Day" extension.
